message: Let's split it evenly to start
You started high, I'll try to counter
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're not being generous enough, I'll try to get more
You're getting closer, but I'm still not ready to give up
You're getting desperate, I'll try to take advantage
I'm running out of options, but I'll try to make a better offer
You're getting close to the deadline, I'll try to squeeze more out of you
